scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:EditPage_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#set ($editDescription = '') #set ($editTitle = '') #if ($context.CurrentPage) #set($editDescription = $context.CurrentPage.Description) #set($editTitle = $context.CurrentPage.Title) #end
#registerEndOfPageHtml('telligent.evolution.widgets.editThemePage') <script src="$core_v2_encoding.HtmlAttributeEncode($core_v2_widget.GetFileUrl('ui.js'))"></script> #end #registerEndOfPageHtml() <script type="text/javascript"> jQuery.telligent.evolution.administration.on('panel.loaded', function(){ jQuery.telligent.evolution.widgets.editThemePage.register({ isDefault: #if($context.ForceDefault) true#else false#end, previewUrl: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($context.PreviewUrl)', hasRelatedStagedItems: #if($context.HasRelatedStagedChanges) true #else false #end, #set($scopedProperties = $context.GetRevertableScopedProperties()) #if ($scopedProperties.Count == 0) hasReversionOptions: false, #else hasReversionOptions: true, reversionHtml: "$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('render-reversion-options.vm'))", #end urls: { setRevert: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_widget.GetExecutedFileUrl('set-revert.vm'))', publishRevert: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_widget.GetExecutedFileUrl('publish-revert.vm'))', updateReversionOptions: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_widget.GetExecutedFileUrl('callback-updatereversionoptions.vm'))' }, text: { saveAndPublish: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('saveAndPublish'))', saveAndPreview: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('saveAndPreview'))', revert: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('revert'))', page: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('page'))', header: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('header'))', footer: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('footer'))', modified: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('modified'))', customized: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('customized'))', notModified: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('not-modified'))', notCustomized: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('not-customized'))', staged: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('staged'))', revertInstructions: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('revert-instructions'))', searchPlaceholder: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('find'))', layout: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('layout'))', widgets: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('widgets'))', saveAndPublishSuccessful: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('save-publish-successful'))', saveAndPreviewSuccessful: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('save-preview-successful'))', saveAndPublishNoChanges: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('save-publish-nochanges'))', saveAndPreviewNoChanges: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('save-preview-nochanges'))', publishContainsStagedItems: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('publish-failed-stagedchanges'))', layoutInstructions: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('layout-instructions'))', widgetInstructions: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('widget-instructions'))', revertOptions: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('revert-options'))', containsStagedChanges: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('contains-staged-changes'))', reviewRelatedStagedChanges: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('review-related-staged-changes'))', previewEnabled: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('preview-enabled'))', openPreview: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('open-preview'))', editingNotAllowedOnSmallScreens: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('no-editing-on-small-screen'))', contextSpecific: { nodefault: { revertToPublished: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('revert-to-published-nodefault'))', revertToPublishedDescription: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('revert-to-published-description-nodefault'))', revertToPublishedConfirmation: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('revert-to-published-confirmation-nodefault'))', revertToPublishedSuccessful: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('revert-to-published-success-nodefault'))', revertToParentConfirmation: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('revert-factory-confirmation-nodefault'))', revertToParentSuccessful: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('revert-factory-successful-nodefault'))', revertToParent: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('revert-to-factory-default-nodefault'))', revertToParentDescription: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('revert-to-factory-default-description-nodefault'))', containerTitle: { page: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($editTitle)', header: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('container-title-header'))', footer: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('container-title-footer'))', }, containerDescription: { #if ($editDescription) page: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('container-description-page-withdescription-nodefault'), $editDescription, '{0}', '{1}'))', #else page: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('container-description-page-withoutdescription-nodefault'), $editDescription, '{0}', '{1}'))', #end header: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('container-description-header-nodefault'))', footer: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('container-description-footer-nodefault'))', } }, 'default': { revertToPublished: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('revert-to-published-default'))', revertToPublishedDescription: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('revert-to-published-description-default'))', revertToPublishedConfirmation: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('revert-to-published-confirmation-default'))', revertToPublishedSuccessful: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('revert-to-published-success-default'))', revertToParentConfirmation: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('revert-factory-confirmation'))', revertToParentSuccessful: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('revert-factory-successful'))', revertToParent: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('revert-to-factory-default'))', revertToParentDescription: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('revert-to-factory-default-description'))', containerTitle: { page: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($editTitle)', header: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('container-title-header'))', footer: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('container-title-footer'))', }, containerDescription: { #if ($editDescription) page: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('container-description-page-withdescription-default'), $editDescription, '{0}', '{1}'))', #else page: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('container-description-page-withoutdescription-default'), $editDescription, '{0}', '{1}'))', #end header: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('container-description-header-default'))', footer: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('container-description-footer-default'))', } }, contextual: { revertToPublished: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('revert-to-published-contextual'))', revertToPublishedDescription: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('revert-to-published-description-contextual'))', revertToPublishedConfirmation: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('revert-to-published-confirmation-contextual'))', revertToPublishedSuccessful: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('revert-to-published-success-contextual'))', revertToParent: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('revert-to-default'))', revertToParentDescription: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('revert-to-default-description'))', revertToParentConfirmation: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('revert-confirmation'))', revertToParentSuccessful: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('revert-successful'))', containerTitle: { page: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($editTitle)', header: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('container-title-header'))', footer: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('container-title-footer'))', }, containerDescription: { #if ($editDescription) page: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('container-description-page-withdescription-contextual'), $editDescription, '{0}', '{1}'))', #else page: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('container-description-page-withoutdescription-contextual'), $editDescription, '{0}', '{1}'))', #end header: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('container-description-header-contextual'))', footer: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('container-description-footer-contextual'))', } } }, reset: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('reset'))', resetDescription: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('reset-description'))', resetSuccessful: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('reset-successful'))', noRevertOptions: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('no-revert-options'))', notEditable: '$core_v2_encoding.JavascriptEncode($core_v2_language.GetResource('not-editable'))' } }); }); </script> #end
scriptedContentFragment.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="container-description-footer-contextual">The footer applied to all pages within '{1}'. Locked widgets will be inherited by any child themes that are configured to inherit footers.</resource> <resource name="container-description-footer-default">The default footer applied to all {0} pages. Locked widgets will be inherited by every {0} and any child themes that are configured to inherit footers.</resource> <resource name="container-description-footer-nodefault">The footer applied to all pages within the {0} theme.</resource> <resource name="container-description-header-contextual">The header applied to all pages within '{1}'. Locked widgets will be inherited by any child themes that are configured to inherit headers.</resource> <resource name="container-description-header-default">The default header applied to all {0} pages. Locked widgets will be inherited by every {0} and any child themes that are configured to inherit headers.</resource> <resource name="container-description-header-nodefault">The header applied to all pages within the {0} theme.</resource> <resource name="container-description-page-withdescription-contextual">{0} Changes apply to '{2}' only.</resource> <resource name="container-description-page-withdescription-default">{0} This page is used as the default for every {1}. Locked widgets will be included on customizations made by each {1}.</resource> <resource name="container-description-page-withdescription-nodefault">{0}</resource> <resource name="container-description-page-withoutdescription-contextual">Changes apply to '{2}' only.</resource> <resource name="container-description-page-withoutdescription-default">This page is used as the default for every {1}. Locked widgets will be included on customizations made by each {1}.</resource> <resource name="container-description-page-withoutdescription-nodefault">(This page has no description)</resource> <resource name="container-title-footer">Footer</resource> <resource name="container-title-header">Header</resource> <resource name="contains-staged-changes">Note: This page contains staged changes.</resource> <resource name="customized">Published edits</resource> <resource name="EditPage_Description">Edit the layout of the current page.</resource> <resource name="EditPage_Name">Edit this Page</resource> <resource name="find">Find a widget...</resource> <resource name="footer">Footer</resource> <resource name="header">Header</resource> <resource name="layout">Layout</resource> <resource name="layout-instructions">Select a layout to arrange content within.</resource> <resource name="modified">Unsaved edits</resource> <resource name="no-editing-on-small-screen"><p>Editing is not allowed when in single-column mode. Please use a desktop browser with a larger window to layout the page.</p></resource> <resource name="no-revert-options">There is nothing to revert. You're working with the latest version already and there are no variations to revert to.</resource> <resource name="not-customized">No published edits</resource> <resource name="not-editable">Not editable</resource> <resource name="not-modified">No unpublished edits</resource> <resource name="open-preview">Open preview window</resource> <resource name="page">Page</resource> <resource name="preview-enabled">Previewing is now enabled. All browsers/devices you are signed into will now show staged changes.</resource> <resource name="publish-failed-stagedchanges">The changes cannot be published because there are pending staged changes that should be reviewed prior to publishing. Please preview instead.</resource> <resource name="reset">Undo all unsaved changes</resource> <resource name="reset-description">All changes that have not yet been saved in this edit session will be reverted.</resource> <resource name="reset-successful">Unsaved changes have been reverted.</resource> <resource name="revert">Revert</resource> <resource name="revert-confirmation">Are you sure you want to revert to the default layout?</resource> <resource name="revert-factory-confirmation">Are you sure you want to revert to the factory default layout?</resource> <resource name="revert-factory-confirmation-nodefault">Are you sure you want to revert to the factory default layout?</resource> <resource name="revert-factory-successful">The reversion to the factory default is complete. The reversion has been staged for review.</resource> <resource name="revert-factory-successful-nodefault">The reversion to the factory default is complete. The reversion has been staged for review.</resource> <resource name="revert-instructions">Select the portion of the page to revert.</resource> <resource name="revert-options">Reversion Options</resource> <resource name="revert-options-instructions">The following shared widget options are customized. Choose which options to revert. Changes will be staged for previewing and can be published with other page edits.</resource> <resource name="revert-successful">The reversion is complete.</resource> <resource name="revert-to-default">Revert to default</resource> <resource name="revert-to-default-description">Any changes made only for '{1}' will be removed and the default for every {0} will be used by '{1}'.</resource> <resource name="revert-to-factory-default">Revert to the factory default</resource> <resource name="revert-to-factory-default-description">Revert the default for every {0} to the factory default.</resource> <resource name="revert-to-factory-default-description-nodefault">Any changes made will be removed and the factory default will be used.</resource> <resource name="revert-to-factory-default-nodefault">Revert to the factory default</resource> <resource name="revert-to-published-confirmation-contextual">Are you sure you want to revert staged changes?</resource> <resource name="revert-to-published-confirmation-default">Are you sure you want to revert staged changes?</resource> <resource name="revert-to-published-confirmation-nodefault">Are you sure you want to revert staged changes?</resource> <resource name="revert-to-published-contextual">Revert staged changes</resource> <resource name="revert-to-published-default">Revert staged changes</resource> <resource name="revert-to-published-description-contextual">Any staged changes made for '{1}' will be removed and the currently published version will be loaded for editing.</resource> <resource name="revert-to-published-description-default">Any staged changes made for the default for every '{0}' will be removed and the currently published version will be loaded for editing.</resource> <resource name="revert-to-published-description-nodefault">Any staged changes will be removed and the currently published version will be loaded for editing.</resource> <resource name="revert-to-published-nodefault">Revert staged changes</resource> <resource name="revert-to-published-success-contextual">Staged changes have been reverted.</resource> <resource name="revert-to-published-success-default">Staged changes have been reverted.</resource> <resource name="revert-to-published-success-nodefault">Staged changes have been reverted.</resource> <resource name="review-related-staged-changes">Previewing is now enabled, however, there are other related changes to review. Would you like to view all of your related staged changes now?</resource> <resource name="saveAndPreview">Preview</resource> <resource name="saveAndPublish">Publish</resource> <resource name="save-preview-nochanges">There are no changes to stage for previewing.</resource> <resource name="save-preview-successful">Your changes have been staged for previewing.</resource> <resource name="save-publish-nochanges">There are no changes to publish.</resource> <resource name="save-publish-successful">Your changes are now published.</resource> <resource name="staged">Changes staged</resource> <resource name="widget-instructions">Drag widgets onto the page to add content.</resource> <resource name="widgets">Widgets</resource> </language>
